questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) A drought-affected area
D) Wildlife and animals

A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A drought-affected area
C) A sports event
D) A family gathering

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) People
B) Buildings
C) Cracked ground
D) Water bodies

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) Cracked, dry ground
D) A body of water

What can be seen in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) More dry ground
C) A city skyline
D) A forest

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Green grass
B) Cracked, dry ground
C) Flowers
D) A pathway

What does the photo suggest about the weather conditions in the area?
A) It is rainy
B) It is snowy
C) It is dry and possibly experiencing a drought
D) It is foggy

What is the texture of the ground in the photo?
A) Smooth and wet
B) Cracked and dry
C) Sandy and loose
D) Rocky and uneven

What might be the cause of the condition depicted in the photo?
A) Heavy rainfall
B) Drought or lack of water
C) Snowfall
D) Human activity

B) Animals

A) Green

C) Brown
D) Red

B) Moderate moisture
